scripts.start-all: concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER,WHITEBOARD -c cyan,green,magenta "npm --prefix client run dev" "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix whiteboard start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently -n ROOT,CLIENT,SERVER,WHITEBOARD -c yellow,cyan,green,magenta "npm install" "npm --prefix client install" "npm --prefix server install" "npm --prefix whiteboard install"
